page.title: 18INDUSTRY
page.content: {LOCAL INDUSTRY. Most of the big employers in the Cynon Valley are situated outside our survey area.However,there are a number of smaller factories.One quite unique factory is the Cambrian Lamp Works at Robertstown.Although coal mining in the valley has virtually disappeared they still produce the famous { {Cambrian Flame Safety Lamps.}They are still an essential piece of pit equipment because they can detect the presence of methane gas.The lamps are also used on ships and in tunnels to determine the presence of sufficient oxygen and carbon dioxide levels.As no other device has yet been invented to measure all three,the future of the miner's safety lamp looks secure and the Cambrian works is likely to be a feature of Aberdare for many years.
